from vpython import *

scene = canvas(title='Horizontal Projectile Motion', width=800, height=600)

ball = sphere(pos=vector(0, 5, 0), radius=0.5, color=color.red)
floor = box(pos=vector(0, 0, 0), size=vector(10, 0.1, 10), color=color.green)

g = 9.81
b = 0.1
h = 5
v0 = 10

t = 0
dt = 0.01

while t < 3:
    rate(100)
    
    ball.pos.x = v0 * t
    ball.pos.y = h - 0.5 * g * t**2
    
    t += dt
log.output:
from vpython import *

scene = canvas(title='Horizontal Projectile Motion', width=800, height=600)

ball = sphere(pos=vector(0, 5, 0), radius=0.5, color=color.green)
floor = box(pos=vector(0, 0, 0), size=vector(10, 0.1, 10), color=color.green)

g = 9.81
b = 0.1
h = 5
v0 = 10

t = 0
dt = 0.01

while t < 3:
    rate(100)
    
    ball.pos.x = v0 * t
    ball.pos.y = h - 0.5 * g * t**2
    
    t += dt
